data.comment: A total of 2327 spectators is reported.
The first-half is under way at BBVA Compass Stadium - Houston kick-off to start the match.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Houston throw-in in Colorado's half.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston's Adam Lundqvist gets in a shot on goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Houston have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Houston.
Throw-in Houston.
Colorado to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
In the minute 9, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Colorado.
Houston's Mauro Manotas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In the minute 14, In Houston a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Houston drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 17, Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Houston.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
In the minute 20, Colorado's Nicolas Mezquida breaks free at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Alex Chilowicz awards Houston a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 23, Houston have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Goal kick for Colorado at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in Houston.
In the minute 25, Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Houston.
Free kick Colorado.
In the minute 30, Free kick Houston.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ariel Lassiter of Houston smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Colorado.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 36, Colorado have a goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz waits before resuming play because Darwin Quintero for Houston is still down.
In the minute 40, Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Colorado at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Tab Ramos (Houston) has taken off Darwin Quintero who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Niko Hansen is the replacement.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ariel Lassiter for Houston drives towards goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Houston.
In the minute 42, Maynor Figueroa (Houston) has received a yellow card from Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 44, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
It's Colorado with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jack Price is replacing Kellyn Acosta for the away team.
Younes Namli is on a sub for Nicolas Mezquida for Colorado.
In the minute 47, Maynor Figueroa for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Alex Chilowicz awards Colorado a goal kick.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Houston.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 53, In Houston Houston attack through Mauro Manotas. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
Houston to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
In the minute 55, Alex Chilowicz signals a Houston throw-in in Colorado's half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Colorado.
Darwin Ceren is booked for the home team.
In the minute 58, Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Colorado.
Houston's Victor Cabrera has been booked in Houston.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Younes Namli is on target to give Colorado a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 62, In Houston Houston attack through Niko Hansen. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Houston advance rapidly upfield but Alex Chilowicz blows for offside.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Victor Cabrera with Alejandro Fuenmayor.
Robin Fraser is making the team's third substitution at BBVA Compass Stadium with Diego Rubio replacing Jonathan Lewis.
Colorado make their fourth substitution with Nicolas Benezet replacing Braian Galvan.
In the minute 68, Houston have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Darwin Ceren (Houston) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Colorado have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Boniek Garcia is replacing Matias Vera for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Mauro Manotas.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
In the minute 71, Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 75, Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Throw-in Colorado.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Throw-in for Colorado close to the penalty box.
Colorado to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
In the minute 81, Keegan Rosenberry is replacing Jeremy Kelly for the away team.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Colorado.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Houston make their fourth substitution with Sam Junqua replacing Ariel Lassiter.
In the minute 85, Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a fifth substitution, with Marcelo Palomino replacing Memo Rodriguez.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
In Houston Houston drive forward through Boniek Garcia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 87, Houston have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Houston just outside Colorado's area.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Colorado's area.
In the minute 89, Colorado needs to be cautious. Houston have an attacking throw-in.
Can Houston capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Houston's Mauro Manotas is on target but unsuccessful.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Houston throw-in in Colorado's half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Lalas Abubakar (Colorado) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Diego Rubio gives Colorado a 1-2 lead.
Great play from Cole Bassett to set up the goal.
